name: Integuru
headline: Integrations without official APIs
description: Integuru builds low-latency integrations with platforms lacking official APIs. We developed the first AI agent that creates permissionless integrations by reverse-engineering internal APIs. Our services include authentication management, building integrations, and hosting.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:b2b; industry:open-source; industry:api; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Richard Zhang, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO of Integuru. Previously, product at Alibaba Cloud; data science at DiDi; and investor at Dragonfly, ZhenFund, and Gaorong Capital.

founders.name: Alan Lu, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CTO of Integuru. Previously, software engineer at Amazon and in the robotic automation division at Bayer.

markdown:
raw_markdown="# Integuru
We build integrations with platforms lacking official APIs. We specialize in low-latency integrations via reverse-engineering. Integrations are open-source by default.
![Backed by Y Combinator](https://www.integuru.ai/backedByYC.png)
## Integration Agent
We built the first AI agent that automates creating third-party integrations. You're welcome to use the agent. Our hosted service helps you manage authentication. 
  * [GitHub Repo](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/github.com/Integuru-AI/Integuru>)
  * [Our Story](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/news.ycombinator.com/item?id=41983409>)


## Our Services
We take care of your custom integrations end-to-end, which includes building, hosting, and authentication. 
## Pricing
If you'd like us to build custom integrations, host, and/or manage authentication: 
  * $0.10 per API call at $150/month minimum per platform
  * Enterprise & Special Requests: contact us


## Contact
If you're interested in working with us, schedule a call with Richard [here](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/calendly.com/d/cqb8-d9x-nbf/integuru>)
## Trust By
_who also appreciate our 1990s website_
  * [Andy AI](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/with-andy.com/>)
  * [Cal.com](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/cal.com/>)
  * [Electric Air](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/electricair.io/>)
  * [Luminai](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/luminai.com/>)
  * [Penciled](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/penciled.com/>)
  * [Retell AI](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/retellai.com/>)
  * [RoverPass](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/roverpass.com/>)
  * [Truss](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/gettruss.io/>)
  * ... and many more

generated_description:
**Integuru: Integrations Made Easy without Official APIs**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch W24, Integuru is a San Francisco-based company with a sharp focus: building low-latency integrations with platforms that lack official APIs. It’s a space that many developers find frustrating, and Integuru is here to change that.

### Mission
Integuru's mission is simple and powerful: **Integrations without official APIs**. They’re on a quest to democratize access to data through innovative integration solutions.

### The Technology
Integuru stands out for developing the first AI agent designed to create permissionless integrations by reverse-engineering internal APIs. This means they can help businesses connect their tools in ways that were previously impossible or cumbersome. Their service encompasses everything from **authentication management** to building and hosting integrations, all aimed at making the developer's life easier.

### Services Offered
Integuru provides a comprehensive set of services:
- **Custom Integrations:** They handle the full lifecycle of integrations, ensuring seamless connectivity between platforms.
- **Hosting and Authentication Management:** They offer hosted services to manage authentication for various integrations.

### Pricing
Pricing is designed to be straightforward:
- **$0.10 per API call**, with a **minimum of $150/month** per platform. They’re also open to special requests from enterprises.

### User-Friendly Approach
Their integrations are open-source by default, a testament to their commitment to transparency and community collaboration. They encourage users to leverage their AI agent, making third-party integration creation more accessible. You can dive into their work via their [GitHub Repo](https://www.integuru.ai/<https:/github.com/Integuru-AI/Integuru>).

### Trust and Partnerships
Integuru has quickly garnered trust from notable companies like Andy AI, Cal.com, Electric Air, Luminai, and more. This speaks volumes about their credibility and the value they provide.

### The Team
Despite being a small team of two, Integuru is making big waves. They’re led by a capable group partner, Gustaf Alstromer, who is no stranger to fostering innovative startups. 

As they continue to carve out their niche in the developer tools market, Integuru represents a significant step forward in how we create integrations. If you’re interested in exploring what they can do for you, you can schedule a call with Richard on their website.

**Website:** [Integuru](https://www.integuru.ai) 

Integuru isn’t just about solving a problem; they’re about creating opportunities in the world of integrations. If you’re tired of the limitations imposed by official APIs, it might be time to check them out.
